title: Emmerdale star teases Robron escape and Chas birth drama in 'insane' hour-long episode
text:

Emmerdale actor Dominic Brunt has teased drama surrounding Robron's plans to flee the village, with Chas Dingle also set to give birth very soon.

The Paddy Kirk actor promised "insane" scenes on the way in an hour-long special this October as several huge plots culminate in one big episode - while the entire week will be unmissable.

Speaking exclusively to Mirror Online at the Inside Soap Awards 2019, Dominic confirmed Robert Sugden and husband Aaron Dingle's escape drama will happen around the same time that Aaron's mother Chas give birth.

Paddy and Chas will soon welcome their second child together, after tragically losing their baby daughter Grace a year ago - while Chas faces further drama as her son decides to go on the run.

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

Robert learns next week that Lee, who he recently attacked after he raped his sister Victoria, has died.

Spoilers for next week's episodes reveal that after Lee's death, Aaron and Robert, known as Robron by loyal fans, will tell their loved ones they have to leave the village for good to avoid Robert going to prison.

Now, Dominic has told us the plot will continue into the ITV soap's big October week, as the shock plan will collide with Chas' birth drama and the affair between Moira Dingle and Nate Robinson being exposed.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

He revealed: "It all happens at the same time. There's an hour-long episode where everything happens and it culminates in that.

"It cuts to high fast, then to high adventure and then to delicate conversations between father figures and families and such.

"It's madness. It's an insane episode, it's one of my favourites in a long time.

(Image: ITV)

"Sometimes it's all adventure, or all this or all that, but it cuts between four situations which are all different."

A soap insider added that the episode would be "gripping" but would have "light tones".

Meanwhile, hinting Paddy might get involved in Aaron and Robert's plans, he added of their hopes to flee: "It affects Chas more than Paddy, but Paddy being Aaron's like father figure he does get involved."

Emmerdale airs weeknights at 7pm on ITV, with an extra episode at 8pm on Thursdays.
description: EXCLUSIVE: Paddy Kirk actor Dominic Brunt has revealed a special episode will feature different key stories including Robron's escape plan
